fill_in_the_blanks.question: Anansi tied the web to the pot, and walked on
Anansi saw Monkey and his wife, cooking beans in a large pot
Everyone was pulling on the web strings at the same time

meanings.vegetable: a plant or part of a plant used as food
meanings.thought: an idea or opinion produced by thinking
meanings.stretch: be made or be capable of being made longer

meanings.thin: with opposite surfaces or sides that are close or relatively close together
meanings.embarassed: cause someone to feel awkward, self-conscious, or ashamed
